name: Larry Johnson
description: I’m a very simple man with a decent life and respect every single person on this planet sure,I do like doing more for fun,outdoors,cinema,going to the shopping center,walking on the beach and holding hands with my partner,I like music much since it keeps me going even when my soul is down,I respect ever soul and my partner much,Love is an emotional thing that i don’t joke with it cause emotional thing is different from everything on this world…Let’s get down to know ourselves more if interested,thanks for stopping by my profile sure.
